forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. South wind 17 to 36 mph, with gusts as high as 54 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. Southwest wind 14 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
The streets of Downtown San Francisco awaken under a canopy of thick, brooding clouds, shadows cast by a day unwilling to shake off its dreariness. The promise of rain dances teasingly in the air, a prelude to the deluge foretold, with moisture already saturating the atmosphere as the temperature hovers around the cool embrace of fifty-seven degrees. As the hours slip into the afternoon, expect the high winds, gusting with a vigor reminiscent of a restless sea, to plummet the warmth to a mere fifty-two. Glancing skyward reveals the tumultuous interplay of wind and rain, as the certainty of reaching for umbrellas persists, with a ninety percent chance of precipitation looming over the city like a well-worn cloak.

As twilight beckons, the showers will not relent, ushering in a nocturnal symphony of raindrops serenading the streetlamps. Temperatures will whisper back to the comfort of forty-five degrees, perhaps rising just a touch as the night deepens. When venturing out into this enveloping gray, warm layers like a sturdy coat and waterproof footwear become the evening’s uniform. Given the weather’s mood, a cozy retreat indoors might be preferable, perhaps seeking out the solace of a quaint bookstore or the warmth of a favorite café—places to gather thoughts amid the soft patter of rain against glass, inviting introspection as the world outside becomes a watercolor painting of shimmering streets and glistening facades.
